title: "null is not an object" error while recovering an account

milestone.title: Beta
milestone.description: Issues and blockers required for the Q2 beta release

body:
### Description

*Type*: Bug

*Summary*: Sometimes, when account is recovered `MESSAGE: null is not an object (evaluating 'u.cljs$core$IFn$_invoke$arity$1')` error appears. When it's dismissed, the app works as expected. I was able to reproduce it twice (only on Android). 

```
05-30 09:10:49.394 11803 11803 I [VR] VrRtVrRuntimeDelegate: VrRtVrRuntimeDelegate onSystemUiVisibilityChange: 2
05-30 09:10:49.396  7221  7283 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:37] - Handling re-frame event:  :change-account-handler
05-30 09:10:49.400  7221  7283 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:37] - Handling re-frame event:  :initialize-account f754bca4657abe7a31d8fd0b382a5682ed579b71
05-30 09:10:49.404  7221  7283 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:37] - Handling re-frame event:  :inbox/get-sym-key-success c9ccbebb0bc30fdaf49c194a7d67750a3593e72619ae17b6b120c3b46092498f
05-30 09:10:49.407  7221  7283 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:37] - Handling re-frame event:  :show-tab-bar
05-30 09:10:49.408  7221  7283 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:37] - Handling re-frame event:  :set :keyboard-height
05-30 09:10:49.411  7221  7283 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:37] - Handling re-frame event:  :initialize-account-db f754bca4657abe7a31d8fd0b382a5682ed579b71
05-30 09:10:49.413  7221  7283 I ReactNativeJS: PRETTY PRINTED EXCEPTION

05-30 09:10:49.413  7221  7283 I ReactNativeJS: MESSAGE: null is not an object (evaluating 'u.cljs$core$IFn$_invoke$arity$1')
05-30 09:10:49.413  7221  7283 I ReactNativeJS:
05-30 09:10:49.413  7221  7283 I ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:6916064
05-30 09:10:49.413  7221  7283 I ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:3912125

05-30 09:10:49.413  7221  7283 I ReactNativeJS: execute@index.android.bundle:12:3840005
05-30 09:10:49.413  7221  7283 I ReactNativeJS: handle@index.android.bundle:12:3848418
05-30 09:10:49.413  7221  7283 I ReactNativeJS: re_frame$router$IEventQueue$_process_1st_event_in_queue$arity$1@index.android.bundle:12:3882967
05-30 09:10:49.413  7221  7283 I ReactNativeJS: re_frame$router$IEventQueue$_run_queue$arity$1@index.android.bundle:12:3865306
05-30 09:10:49.413  7221  7283 I ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:3871058
05-30 09:10:49.413  7221  7283 I ReactNativeJS: re_frame$router$IEventQueue$_fsm_trigger$arity$3@index.android.bundle:12:3875269
05-30 09:10:49.413  7221  7283 I ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:3867824
05-30 09:10:49.413  7221  7283 I ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:32:1369

05-30 09:10:49.450  7221  7221 D ViewRootImpl@3d12f21[MainActivity]: ThreadedRenderer.create() translucent=true
05-30 09:10:49.451  3751  4207 D WindowManager: addWindow: android.view.IWindow$Stub$Proxy@22a5305 displayId=0
```

#### Expected behavior
Account can be recovered without any errors.

#### Actual behavior
The error appear. 

### Reproduction

It's hard to reproduce it. But, here are the steps: 

- Open Status on Android
- Click add existing account 
- Recover an account

### Additional Information
* Status version: nightly, May 30
* Operating System: Android
